name: Crash Lab Escape
description:
You are a crash dummy who have finally outsmarted your evil masters by learning how to move. However, after decades of literally devoting your body to car crash analysis, causing serious injuries and unbearable pain, your physical abilities are limited. 

Nevertheless, with your newly developed skills you are now more than ever eager to experience the beauty of life outside these lifesucking walls. 

Try to escape, as far away as possible, from this hell of a lab. Watch out for wicked obstacles, all trying to keep you away from your dream - A life of your own.
